fields.name: JT_BaseQuery__c
fields.label: Base Query (SOQL)
fields.help: The SOQL query to execute. Use bind variables with colon syntax (e.g., :accountName) for dynamic parameters.

fields.name: JT_Binding__c
fields.label: Bindings (JSON)
fields.help: Optional JSON object with predefined bind variable values. Example: {"accountName":"ACME Corp","status":"Active"}

fields.name: JT_ObjectName__c
fields.label: Object Name
fields.help: The Salesforce object being queried (e.g., Account, Contact, Opportunity).
